presets.name: RUNWAY 35L IN USE
presets.airportConditions: EXPECT ILS/Z RWY 35 LEFT. TRL FL40 /RWY35L FOR LDG. /RWY35L FOR TOFF. /AFTER VACATING RUNWAY 35L HOLD SHORT OF RUNWAY 35R. /RISK OF CONFUSION BETWEEN RWY 35L AND RWY 35R. / RISK OF CONFUSION BETWEEN RWY 35R AND TAXIWAY TANGO. /ON FIRST CONTACT ADVISE TOWER ABOUT EXPECTED VACATING TAXIWAY. /HEAVY TRAFFIC ENTERING OR LEAVING STANDS MUST USE MINIMUM POWER.
